document.full_text: at least 54 homes were destroyed by wind-driven grass fires that spread quickly through drought-stricken oklahoma, but that damage figure will climb after state-wide assessments are completed, officials said on saturday.
document.title: grass fires destroy at least 54 oklahoma homes
lines_and_colors: at least 54 homes were destroyed by wind-driven grass fires that spread quickly through drought-stricken oklahoma, but that damage figure will climb after state-wide assessments are completed, officials said on saturday.
